TopicTitle: How to get government funding for space exploration.

Articles.Content: Tell the politicians you want to blow stuff up. http://www.smbc-comics.com/?id=1522#comic
There is oil on Mars along with alien terriosts who are working on a nuclear bomb using research provided by Iran. That ought to get some real funding.

We must develop the Space Launch Missile to fight the evil aliens!!
